line.text: Welcome to the Forest World!
How are you enjoying it so far?
I have lost count of how many years I have been here...
If you go South from here you'll find The Arena. Beat the Boss and then you get a reward!
You made it this far!
I am quite surprised you got here to be honest!
Step into the portal to leave this world!
Collect ancient runes to activate the portal!
Good luck and safe travels!
Whoa! Where did you come from?
This is Winter World! Welcome.
Err yeah! You may have noticed it is pretty cold here!
Try not to step on the ice!
The Pool of Replenishment only works once!
You made it across this harsh world!
Have you collected enough ancient runes to activate the portal?
Go! Leave this world for the next!
May you have good fortune in the next world!
Welcome to The Desert!
I don't get many visitors here.
Lots of ancient stuff to explore here!
You don't have any water do you? I'm a bit parched.
I have waited here for many centuries!
Few have passed this way.
The Desert drives men mad.
The Desert is a tough place, but the next world...ha ha ha!
